item.title: 莱斯库雷说，法国评级一年内第三次被下调是对加强努力的呼唤
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，法国不能忽视不到一年内的第三次信用评级下调。【原文：France can’t afford to ignore the third credit-rating reduction in less than a year, according to French Finance Minister Roland Lescure.】

item.title: 新加坡和泰国调查美国锁定的涉嫌诈骗团伙
item.description: 在美国和英国以欺诈和洗钱指控对柬埔寨一家房地产集团的董事长实施制裁后，泰国和新加坡当局正在对该集团进行调查。【原文：Thai and Singapore authorities are looking into a Cambodian real estate group after the US and the UK imposed sanctions on the company’s chairman on allegations of fraud and money laundering.】

item.title: 中国官员试图缓解全球对稀土限制的担忧
item.description: 中国官员在华盛顿出访时试图缓解人们对其令人震惊的稀土限制措施升级的担忧，在与美国进行贸易谈判的同时试图缓和国际社会的反弹。【原文：Chinese officials tried to ease concerns over its shock escalation of rare earth curbs while traveling in Washington, attempting to soften an international backlash while trade negotiations with the US proceed.】

item.title: 德国军队复兴面临住房严重短缺问题
item.description: 在过去的十年中，德国南部的海德堡市致力于将一个前美军基地改造成一个热闹的街区，容纳一万名居民和数千个新的工作岗位，其愿景是打造一个 "超越地区的独特新区"。【原文：For the past decade, the city of Heidelberg in southern Germany worked to transform a former US army base into a buzzing neighborhood for 10,000 residents and thousands of new jobs, with a vision to create a “unique new district that shines beyond the region.”】

item.title: 中美摩擦加剧，中国稀土产品出口萎缩
item.description: 中国 9 月份稀土产品出口量环比下降，原因是中国政府对战略矿产的严格控制波及全球供应链，并加剧了与华盛顿的紧张关系。【原文：China’s exports of rare earth products fell in September from a month earlier, as Beijing’s tighter controls on strategic minerals ripple through global supply chains and heighten tensions with Washington.】

item.title: 斯塔默的中国困境意味着 "一团糟 "变得更加棘手
item.description: 在中国问题上，欧盟在没有 "脱钩 "的情况下温和地尝试 "去风险"。唐纳德-特朗普把美国放在首位，发动了一场全面的贸易战。直到上周，英国采取了一种看起来很像得过且过的做法。【原文：When it comes to China, the EU tried gently to ‘de-risk’ without ‘de-coupling’. Donald Trump put America first and launched a full-on trade war. Until last week, the UK took an approach that looked a lot like muddling through.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司、持有人寻求 3.14 亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）和配售
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司 Grupo Aeromexico SAB 及其部分股东正在寻求在期待已久的首次公开募股和私募中筹集多达 3.14 亿美元的资金，这距离该公司摆脱破产已经过去了三年多的时间。【原文：Grupo Aeromexico SAB and some of its shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $314 million in a long-awaited initial public offering and private placement, over three years after the Mexican airline emerged from bankruptcy.】

item.title: Blackstone、TPG 接近以超过 170 亿美元的价格达成 Hologic 交易
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 和 TPG Inc. 正就收购 Hologic Inc. 进行深入谈判，该交易对这家医疗设备制造商的估值可能超过 170 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and TPG Inc. are in advanced negotiations to acquire Hologic Inc. in a deal that could value the medical device maker at more than $17 billion including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: S&P下调法国评级，法国遭债务警告
item.description: S&P全球评级公司下调了法国的评级，这是对该国信誉的又一次打击，因为被削弱的少数派政府正努力通过立法来解决债务负担膨胀的问题。【原文：S&P Global Ratings downgraded France, dealing another blow to the country’s credibility as a weakened minority government struggles to pass legislation to tackle a swelling debt burden.】

item.title: Sonder 旅馆公司寻求债权人交易以避免破产
item.description: Sonder Holdings Inc.是一家专注于精品公寓的在线租赁公司，据熟悉此事的人士透露，该公司正在寻求与债权人达成庭外协议，为避免申请破产做最后的努力。【原文：Sonder Holdings Inc., an online rental company that focuses on boutique apartments, is pursuing an out-of-court agreement with creditors in a last-ditch effort to avoid a bankruptcy filing, according to people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be identified discussing a private matter.】

item.title: 小特朗普的公司为新的 SPAC 挑选帕利哈皮蒂亚和美国共和党有影响力的人士
item.description: 小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）、投资者查马特-帕利哈皮蒂亚（Chamath Palihapitiya）和福克斯新闻主持人劳拉-英格拉哈姆（Laura Ingraham）都是其董事会成员。【原文：A blank-check vehicle that counts Donald Trump Jr., investor Chamath Palihapitiya and Fox News host Laura Ingraham among its board members is seeking to raise $260 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 阿根廷外汇交易员估计美国国债卖出超过 2 亿美元
item.description: 据交易商估计，美国财政部周五买入的阿根廷比索比其他任何交易日都要多，因为尽管有美国的支持，阿根廷比索仍在继续贬值。【原文：The US Treasury bought more Argentine pesos Friday than it had in any other session, traders estimated, as the currency continued to lose value despite American support.】

item.title: 穆迪自 2021 年以来首次下调博茨瓦纳信用评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）自 2021 年以来首次下调了博茨瓦纳的信用评级，理由是博茨瓦纳政府在适应钻石业衰退方面面临挑战。【原文：Moody’s Ratings cut Botswana’s credit score for the first time since 2021, citing the government’s challenges in adjusting to a downturn in the diamond industry.】

item.title: 克莱尔莱克公司纽福德寻求通过附带协议支持债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由 Clearlake Capital Group 支持的 Newfold Digital 正在通过与不在最初谈判范围内的贷款人签订附带协议，为其最近达成的债务重组寻求更多债权人的支持。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group-backed Newfold Digital is courting additional creditor support for its recently agreed upon debt restructuring via side pacts with lenders that were not part of the original negotiations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Salesforce 的贝尼奥夫为支持特朗普国民警卫队的言论道歉
item.description: Salesforce Inc.首席执行官马克-贝尼奥夫（Marc Benioff）就呼吁唐纳德-特朗普总统向旧金山派遣国民警卫队一事道歉，此前近一周，他的言论受到了当地盟友和政府官员的公开批评。【原文：Salesforce Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Benioff apologized for calling on President Donald Trump to send the National Guard to San Francisco, after almost a week of public criticism from local allies and government officials for his statements.】

item.title: 数万亿美元风险飙升，华尔街惶恐不安
item.description: 在经历了两个月的市场繁荣之后，华尔街正在从沉睡中苏醒。【原文：After two months of market bliss, Wall Street is stirring from its slumber.】

item.title: 梅洛尼获得 DBRS 2018 年以来最高评级
item.description: 晨星银行（Morningstar DBRS）对意大利政府推动控制预算赤字的做法表示赞赏，意大利在所有主要信用评估机构中重新获得了2018年以来的最高分。【原文：Italy regained its highest score from any major credit assessor since 2018 after an upgrade by Morningstar DBRS that commended the government’s push to tame the budget deficit.】

item.title: 人工智能音乐生成器 Suno 正在进行估值 20 亿美元的融资谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，利用人工智能生成音乐的初创公司 Suno Inc.【原文：Suno Inc., a startup that generates music using artificial intelligence, is in talks to raise over $100 million at a valuation of more than $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, quadruple its previous valuation.】

item.title: 股票暴跌后，散户因比特币炒作损失 170 亿美元
item.description: 据一份新的研究报告称，散户投资者在试图通过 Metaplanet 和迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor's Strategy）等数字资产财务公司获得比特币风险敞口的过程中损失了约 170 亿美元。这些损失来自于股票溢价定价过高，使得这些公司出售股票的价格远远高于其实际持有的加密货币价值。【原文：Retail investors have lost an estimated $17 billion in an attempt to gain Bitcoin exposure through digital asset treasury firms such as Metaplanet and Michael Saylor’s Strategy, according to a new research report. These losses came from an overpricing of share premiums that allowed these companies to sell stock for far above the value of their actual crypto holdings.】

item.title: 花旗称俄乌局势缓和 石油风险降至 50 美元
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.高级商品策略师 Eric Lee 认为。【原文：A de-escalation of Russia’s war in Ukraine threatens to push oil prices toward $50 a barrel, according to Citigroup Inc. Senior Commodities Strategist Eric Lee.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉资本探讨收购 Clear Channel Outdoor
item.description: 据知情人士透露，穆巴达拉资本公司（Mubadala Capital）正在探索收购 Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Inc.【原文：Mubadala Capital is exploring an acquisition of Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃尔玛设立领导无人机和自动配送技术的职位
item.description: 沃尔玛公司任命一位公司资深人士领导无人机和其他新技术的推广工作，以便将产品送到购物者手中。【原文：Walmart Inc. named a company veteran to lead the expansion of drones and other new technologies for the big-box retailer to bring products to shoppers.】

item.title: 自上次停摆以来联邦工人申请失业救济的人数最多
item.description: 美国劳工部的最新数据显示，自上次政府关门以来，美国联邦政府工作人员申请失业救济的人数最多。【原文：US federal workers filed the most applications for unemployment benefits since the last government shutdown, according to the latest Labor Department data.】

item.title: 贸易战升级，全球金融首脑呼吁保持冷静
item.description: 本周，来自世界各地的财政首脑结束了会谈，他们对贸易紧张局势、地缘政治不信任以及美国主导的人工智能热潮所带来的欣喜都给全球经济带来了日益根深蒂固的风险这一现实感到无奈。【原文：Finance chiefs from around the world wrapped up talks this week resigned to the reality that trade tensions, geopolitical mistrust and the euphoria over the US-led boom in artificial intelligence all pose increasingly entrenched risks to the global economy.】

item.title: Wunsch 表示，欧洲央行可以接受与 2% 目标的有限偏离
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员皮埃尔-旺施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，欧洲中央银行不应对偏离其 2% 通胀目标的微小偏差做出反应，尤其是当这些偏差是由货币政策无能为力的因素造成时。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t react to small deviations from its 2% inflation goal, especially when they’re due to factors that monetary policy can do little about, Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch said.】

item.title: 麦克莱姆认为加拿大劳动力市场 "疲软"，尽管九月份有所增长
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，他认为加拿大劳动力市场 "疲软"，尽管最近的数据显示加拿大 9 月份新增了 6.04 万个就业岗位。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said he sees the Canadian labor market as “soft” despite recent data that showed the country added 60,400 jobs in September.】

item.title: 南非艰难的二十国集团债务宣言招致批评
item.description: 以南非为首的 20 国集团财政负责人在华盛顿就解决日益严重的主权债务危机达成了最后一刻宣言，但活动家们对此却不以为然，认为该宣言过于怯懦，难以发挥作用。【原文：Activists dismissed a last-minute declaration agreed by Group of 20 finance chiefs led by South Africa in Washington on tackling the growing sovereign-debt crisis as too timid to make a difference.】

item.title: 贝森特表示将于下周在马来西亚会见中国国家主席习近平
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他将于今晚与中国副总理何立峰通话，然后可能于一周后在马来西亚举行面对面会谈。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he will speak with his Chinese counterpart, Vice Premier He Lifeng this evening, ahead of a likely in-person meeting in Malaysia in a week.】

item.title: DRW 的威尔逊抨击交易所在加密货币暴跌期间的做法
item.description: 在上周加密货币市场崩溃期间，芝加哥自营交易大户 DRW 控股有限责任公司（DRW Holdings LLC）创始人唐纳德-威尔逊（Donald R. Wilson）批评了数字资产交易所的做法。【原文：Donald R. Wilson, founder of Chicago-based proprietary trading powerhouse DRW Holdings LLC, criticized the practices of digital asset exchanges during last week’s crypto market meltdown, where cascading liquidations led to record losses.】
